 22  """convert iCal files to Gettext PO localization files""" 
 23   
 24  import sys 
 25  from translate.storage import po 
 26  from translate.storage import ical 
 27   

 28 -class ical2po: 

 29      """convert a iCal file to a .po file for handling the translation...""" 

 30 -    def convert_store(self, input_store, duplicatestyle="msgctxt"): 

 31          """converts a iCal file to a .po file...""" 
 32          output_store = po.pofile() 
 33          output_header = output_store.init_headers(charset="UTF-8", encoding="8bit") 
 34          output_header.addnote("extracted from %s" % input_store.filename, "developer") 
 35          for input_unit in input_store.units: 
 36              output_unit = self.convert_unit(input_unit, "developer") 
 37              if output_unit is not None: 
 38                  output_store.addunit(output_unit) 
 39          output_store.removeduplicates(duplicatestyle) 
 40          return output_store 

 41   

 42 -    def merge_store(self, template_store, input_store, blankmsgstr=False, duplicatestyle="msgctxt"): 

 43          """converts two iCal files to a .po file...""" 
 44          output_store = po.pofile() 
 45          output_header = output_store.init_headers(charset="UTF-8", encoding="8bit") 
 46          output_header.addnote("extracted from %s, %s" % (template_store.filename, input_store.filename), "developer") 
 47   
 48          input_store.makeindex() 
 49          for template_unit in template_store.units: 
 50              origpo = self.convert_unit(template_unit, "developer") 
 51              # try and find a translation of the same name... 
 52              template_unit_name = "".join(template_unit.getlocations()) 
 53              if template_unit_name in input_store.locationindex: 
 54                  translatedini = input_store.locationindex[template_unit_name] 
 55                  translatedpo = self.convert_unit(translatedini, "translator") 
 56              else: 
 57                  translatedpo = None 
 58              # if we have a valid po unit, get the translation and add it... 
 59              if origpo is not None: 
 60                  if translatedpo is not None and not blankmsgstr: 
 61                      origpo.target = translatedpo.source 
 62                  output_store.addunit(origpo) 
 63              elif translatedpo is not None: 
 64                  print >> sys.stderr, "error converting original iCal definition %s" % origpo.name 
 65          output_store.removeduplicates(duplicatestyle) 
 66          return output_store 

 67   

 68 -    def convert_unit(self, input_unit, commenttype): 

 69          """Converts a .ini unit to a .po unit. Returns None if empty 
 70          or not for translation.""" 
 71          if input_unit is None: 
 72              return None 
 73          # escape unicode 
 74          output_unit = po.pounit(encoding="UTF-8") 
 75          output_unit.addlocation("".join(input_unit.getlocations())) 
 76          output_unit.addnote(input_unit.getnotes("developer"), "developer") 
 77          output_unit.source = input_unit.source 
 78          output_unit.target = "" 
 79          return output_unit 

 80   

 81 -def convertical(input_file, output_file, template_file, pot=False, duplicatestyle="msgctxt"): 

 82      """Reads in L{input_file} using iCal, converts using L{ical2po}, writes to L{output_file}""" 
 83      input_store = ical.icalfile(input_file) 
 84      convertor = ical2po() 
 85      if template_file is None: 
 86          output_store = convertor.convert_store(input_store, duplicatestyle=duplicatestyle) 
 87      else: 
 88          template_store = ical.icalfile(template_file) 
 89          output_store = convertor.merge_store(template_store, input_store, blankmsgstr=pot, duplicatestyle=duplicatestyle) 
 90      if output_store.isempty(): 
 91          return 0 
 92      output_file.write(str(output_store)) 
 93      return 1 

 94   

 95 -def main(argv=None): 

 96      from translate.convert import convert 
 97      formats = {"ics": ("po", convertical), ("ics", "ics"): ("po", convertical)} 
 98      parser = convert.ConvertOptionParser(formats, usetemplates=True, usepots=True, description=__doc__) 
 99      parser.add_duplicates_option() 
100      parser.passthrough.append("pot") 
101      parser.run(argv) 

102   
103  if __name__ == '__main__': 
104      main()
